title: New: RXY – Dystopia
content:
Citing Florence And The Machine, Cocorosie and Kate Bush as influences, London’s RXY doesn’t stray too far from these inspirations on her debut track.

Dystopia, is a journey through the aforementioned sounds, focusing heavily on the vocals of Roxy Blake, and the synth driven verses. ‘I could live for a thousand years, if they went by on your wrist‘ may well be one of the most eloquent declarations of love you’ll hear this year. Check out Dystopia below, taken from RXY’s debut album Out Of Time And Into Space, out next week.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
